scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.ethereum.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json ./src/utils/constants/index.template.ts > ./src/utils/constants/index.ts && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:avalanche: mustache config/avalanche.json subgraph.avalanche.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json ./src/utils/constants/index.template.ts > ./src/utils/constants/index.ts && yarn codegen
